text: Stephen 'Steve' Collins (born 8 June 1966 in Manchester, England) is a former Speedway rider.Oakes, P.(2004). British Speedway Who's Who. ==Family== Steve has four brothers all of whom were speedway riders, Peter, Les, Neil and Phil. His nephews Aidan and Chris were also riders but have both retired from the sport. ==External links== *Aidan Collins Website == References == Category:Living people Category:1966 births Category:British speedway riders Category:English motorcycle racers Category:Sportspeople from Manchester Category:Cradley Heathens riders Category:Birmingham Brummies riders Category:Lakeside Hammers riders
title: Stephen Collins (speedway rider)
